page.title: 08My School Day (Karen aged 8)
page.content: The first thing I do on any morning except Saturday and Sunday is to go to school. My class lines up at five min- utes to nine and then the bell goes and our teacher lets us in. When we come in we sometimes do our times tables in our number books. Then we go into Assembly. We sing hymns about God and Jesus and nature. We sometimes pray or perform a play and listen to records and stories. The headmaster gives out swimming certificates (we go swimming every Monday). Every day we do some writing and mathematics. Occasionally we do sewing, cooking, P.E. and Games, reading, music, hand- writing and art and craft. We watch Zig-Zag on television every Monday. Sometimes we use the computer or the listening centre (a tape recorder with eight pairs of headphones).
